sentences.en: He worked awhile as a pharmacist in Cincinnati.
sentences.cn: 他在辛辛那提做了一阵子的药剂师。

sentences.en: The pharmacist will advise which medicines are safe to take.
sentences.cn: 药剂师会建议服用哪些药才安全。

sentences.en: The pharmacist can assist you with the treatment of common ailments.
sentences.cn: 药剂师能帮助你治疗平常小病。
